content:
Hey, i installed the docker-zulip server with docker-compose but i don't get the push notifications to work.
I uncommented the SETTING_PUSH_NOTIFICATION_BOUNCER_URL: 'https://push.zulipchat.com' and issued a docker-compose exec zulip sudo -H -u zulip -g zulip /home/zulip/deployments/current/manage.py register_server.

On the /var/log/zulip/events_missedmessage_mobile_notifications.log log i just find the following line:
2019-08-18 09:21:30.392 INFO [zerver.lib.push_notifications] Sending push notifications to mobile clients for user 9

Is there any way to debug this issue deeper?
@Peter.Random did you restart the server after doing the registration?
